resources.string: xbmc-jsonrpclib-android
Connection timed out.
The host could not be reached. Are you connected to the same network?
Connection refused.
Could not connect. Are you sure that XBMC is running and your port settings are correct?
Connection problem, please check logs.
Something unexpected happened, please file a bug report with logs attached.
Error while connecting.
Something unexpected happened while connecting. Please file a bug report with logs attached.
Data could not been read from server.
Are you sure you\'re still connected?
Data could not been sent to server.
Are you sure you\'re still connected?
Cannot connect to specified address.
Check your host settings. If you\'re using a host name instead of an IP address, make sure your Android device is aware of the host name.
Invalid URL. See logs for more info.
Looks like an internal error. Please submit a bug report with logs included.
JSON error. See logs for more info.
Something went wrong while parsing the JSON data received by the server. Please submit a bug report with logs included.
Received different response than expected.
Sounds like an internal error. Please submit a bug report with logs attached.
JSON-RPC returned an error.
This most probably means that there\'s a bug in our API library. Please submit a report with logs included.
Unsupported encoding. Please check logs.
Sounds like a bug. Please submit a bug report with logs included.
Server returned unexpected HTTP status code.
Sounds like a bug. Please submit a bug report with logs included.
Server said bad request.
Something was sent to the server differently that expected. Please submit a bug report with logs included.
Unauthorized access.
Server expected credentials but you\'ve either provided none or the wrong ones.
Access forbidden.
You need to provide different credentials.
Not found.
Sounds like a configuration bug. You sure you\'ve typed the correct URL?
